Mathematical Formulation: $\min_{x \in [0,1]^n} \left\{ \frac{1}{2}x^T P x + q^T x + \sum_i s_i \right\}, \text{ subject to relaxed discrete constraints}$
$\min_{x \in \mathbb{R}^n} \left\{ \sum_i \left(\frac{1}{2}x^T P_i x + q_i^T x\right) + \text{slack for } x^d \text{ terms} \right\}$
$\min_{x \in \mathbb{R}^n} \left\{ \frac{1}{2}x^T P x + q^T x + \sum_k \epsilon_k \right\}, \text{ using convex outer bounds}$
$\min_{b} \left\{ \frac{1}{2} b^T P b + q^T b + \alpha \|b - As\|^2 + \kappa \|b - o\|^2 \right\}$
